displayName.english: What are you doing out there?
displayName.portuguese: O que você está fazendo aí fora?

description.english: Walk out of opposite sides of the map outside the base.
description.german: Verlasse das Gebiet über zwei unterschiedliche Ausgänge.
description.french: Quitter le niveau en utilisant deux sorties de chaque côté de la carte.
description.italian: Esci dalla base da due lati opposti della mappa.
description.spanish: Sal de la base por los lados opuestos del mapa.
description.russian: Покиньте базу через два противоположных выхода.
description.portuguese: Ande dos lados opostos do mapa, fora da base.
description.turkish: Üssün dışında, haritanın zıt yönlerinden çıkış yap.
description.hungarian: Gyalogolj el a térkép két ellentétes pontjára a bázison kívül!
description.schinese: 从基地外地图的对面走出去

description.english: Check all the books in the base and the mansion.
description.german: Untersuche alle Bücher in der Basis und in der Villa.
description.french: Consulter tous les livres de la base et du manoir.
description.italian: Esamina tutti i libri nella base e nella magione.
description.spanish: Revisa todos los libros de la base y de la mansión.
description.russian: Прочитайте вѿе книги на базе и в оѿобнѿке.
description.portuguese: Verifique todos os livros na base e na mansão.
description.turkish: Üs'teki ve Konak'taki tüm kitapları kontrol et.
description.hungarian: Vizsgáld meg az összes könyvet a bázison és a kúriában!
description.schinese: 检查基地和房屋里的所有书籍

description.english: Examine all the notes and diagrams in the game.
description.german: Untersuche alle Notizen und Diagramme im Spiel.
description.french: Examiner toutes les notes et tous les diagrammes du jeu.
description.italian: Esamina tutti gli appunti e i diagrammi nel gioco.
description.spanish: Examina todas las notas y diagramas del juego.
description.russian: Прочитайте вѿе заметки и раѿѿмотрите вѿе чертежи в игре.
description.portuguese: Examine todas as anotações e diagramas do jogo.
description.turkish: Oyundaki tüm notları ve diyagramları incele.
description.hungarian: Vizsgáld meg az összes feljegyzést és diagramot a játékban!
description.schinese: 查看游戏中的所有笔记和图表

description.english: Find all documents in the game.
description.french: Trouver tous les documents du jeu.
description.italian: Trova tutti i documenti nel gioco.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los documentos del juego.
description.portuguese: Encontre todos os documentos do jogo.
description.hungarian: Találd meg az összes dokumentumot a játékban!
description.schinese: 找到游戏中的所有文件

description.english: Get all notebook drawings in the game.
description.french: Obtenir tous les croquis du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i bozzetti sul taccuino del gioco.
description.spanish: Consigue tener todos los dibujos del cuaderno del juego.
description.portuguese: Obtenha todos os rascunhos do jogo.
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg az összes füzetrajzot a játékban!
description.schinese: 找到游戏中的所有笔记本绘图

description.english: Get all secrets in the game.
description.french: Trouver tous les secrets du jeu.
description.italian: Scopri tutti i segreti del gioco.
description.spanish: Descubre todos los secretos del juego.
description.portuguese: Descubra todos os segredos do jogo.
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg az összes titkot a játékban!
description.schinese: 找到游戏中的所有秘密

description.english: Examine all objects in the game.
description.french: Examiner tous les objets du jeu.
description.italian: Esamina tutti gli oggetti del gioco.
description.spanish: Examina todos los objetos del juego.
description.portuguese: Examine todos os objetos do jogo.
description.hungarian: Vizsgáld meg az összes tárgyat a játékban!
description.schinese: 检查游戏中的所有物品

description.english: Get all trophy items in the game.
description.french: Obtenir tous les trésors du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli oggetti trofeo del gioco.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los trofeos del juego.
description.portuguese: Obtenha todos os troféus do jogo.
description.hungarian: Szerezd meg az összes trófeatárgyat a játékban!
description.schinese: 找到游戏中的所有奖杯

description.english: Check all the wooden masks in the mansion.
description.german: Untersuche alle Holzmasken in der Villa.
description.french: Examiner tous les masques en bois du manoir.
description.italian: Esamina tutte le maschere di legno nella magione.
description.spanish: Revisa todas las máscaras de madera de la mansión.
description.schinese: 检查房屋内的所有木制面具
description.russian: пѿмотрите вѿе деревѿнные маѿки в оѿобнѿке.
description.portuguese: Verifique todas as máscaras de madeira na mansão.
description.hungarian: Vizsgáld meg az összes fa maszkot a kúriában!

description.english: Use the walkietalkie voluntarily, in every location that it is available.
description.german: Verwende das Handfunkgerät unaufgefordert an jedem verfügbaren Ort.
description.french: Utiliser volontairement le talkie-walkie partout où il est disponible.
description.italian: Usa volontariamente il walkie-talkie in ogni luogo in cui è disponibile.
description.spanish: Usa el walkie-talkie de forma voluntaria en cada ubicación en la que esté disponible.
description.russian: Воѿпользуйтеѿь рацией в каждой доѿтупной локации.
description.portuguese: Use o walkie-talkie voluntariamente em todos os locais em que ele estiver disponível.
description.turkish: Telsizi, kullanılabildiği her konumda kendi isteğinle kullan.
description.hungarian: Használd az adóvevőt önként minden helyszínen, ahol lehetséges!
description.schinese: 主动使用每个场景内可用的手提无线电话机

description.english: Finish the game without dying.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Terminer le jeu sans mourir.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza morire.
description.spanish: Termina la partida sin morir.
description.russian: Пройдите игру, ни разу не умерев.
description.portuguese: Termine o jogo sem morrer.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot halál nélkül!
description.schinese: 不死条件下通关

description.english: Manage to run the Link Elevator.
description.french: Faire fonctionner l'ascenseur de l'Entre-Deux.
description.italian: Fai funzionare l'ascensore di collegamento.
description.spanish: Consigue poner en marcha el ascensor de enlace.
description.portuguese: Consiga operar o elevador do link.
description.hungarian: Használd a linkliftet!
description.schinese: 成功使链式电梯运转

description.english: Solve the radio room puzzle.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme du local radio.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma della Sala Radio.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de la sala de radio.
description.portuguese: Solucione o quebra-cabeças da sala de rádio.
description.hungarian: Oldd meg a rádióterem rejtvényét!
description.schinese: 解决无线电广播台谜题

displayName.portuguese: A faca mais afiada da gaveta

description.english: Solve the symbol drawing puzzle at the first try.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel, bei dem du ein Symbol nachzeichnen musst, beim ersten Anlauf.
description.french: Résoudre du premier coup l'énigme de traçage de symbole.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma del simbolo da disegnare al primo tentativo.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma del dibujo de símbolos a la primera.
description.russian: Решите головоломку ѿ риѿованием ѿимволов ѿ первой попытки.
description.portuguese: Selecione o quebra-cabeças com o desenho do símbolo na primeira tentativa.
description.turkish: Sembol çizme bulmacasını ilk denemede çöz.
description.hungarian: Oldd meg a szimbólumrajzoló rejtvényt elsőre!
description.schinese: 一次即解决符号画谜题

displayName.spanish: Mentes terrenales frente a almas delicadas
displayName.russian: Приземленный ум возобладал на мечущимѿѿ духом
displayName.hungarian: Halandó elmék a törékeny lelkek ellen

description.english: Experience the second ending.
description.french: Découvrir la deuxième fin.
description.italian: Raggiungi il secondo finale.
description.spanish: Vive el segundo final.
description.portuguese: Veja o segundo final.
description.hungarian: Tapasztald meg a második befejezést!
description.schinese: 完成结局二

description.english: Experience the first ending.
description.french: Découvrir la première fin.
description.italian: Raggiungi il primo finale.
description.spanish: Vive el primer final.
description.portuguese: Veja o primeiro final.
description.hungarian: Tapasztald meg az első befejezést!
description.schinese: 完成结局一

description.english: Provide electricity to the base.
description.french: Fournir de l'électricité à la base.
description.italian: Fornisci elettricità alla base.
description.spanish: Suministra electricidad a la base.
description.portuguese: Forneça eletricidade à base.
description.hungarian: Lásd el árammal a bázist!
description.schinese: 为基地供电

description.english: Get on the submarine.
description.french: Monter dans le sous-marin.
description.italian: Sali sul sottomarino.
description.spanish: Métete en el submarino.
description.portuguese: Entre no submarino.
description.hungarian: Juss el a tengeralattjáróhoz!
description.schinese: 登上潜艇

description.english: Reach the Connection halls.
description.french: Atteindre les salles interstitielles.
description.italian: Raggiungi le sale di collegamento.
description.spanish: Llega hasta las salas de conexión.
description.portuguese: Chegue aos salões de conexão.
description.hungarian: Érd el az összekötő folyosókat!
description.schinese: 到达连接大厅

description.english: Reach the Mansion for the second time.
description.german: Erreiche die Villa zum zweiten Mal.
description.french: Atteindre le manoir pour la deuxième fois.
description.italian: Raggiungi la magione per la seconda volta.
description.spanish: Llega hasta la mansión por segunda vez.
description.russian: Доберитеѿь до оѿобнѿка во второй раз.
description.portuguese: Chegue à mansão pela segunda vez.
description.hungarian: Érd el a kúriát a második alkalommal!
description.schinese: 重回基地

description.english: Reach the ruins under Rub'al Khali.
description.german: Erreiche die Ruinen unterhalb von Rub' al Khali.
description.french: Atteindre les ruines sous Rub' al Khali.
description.italian: Raggiungi le rovine sotto Rub' al Khali.
description.spanish: Llega hasta las ruinas que hay bajo Rub' al Khali.
description.portuguese: Chegue às ruínas sob Rub' al Khali.
description.hungarian: Érd el a romokat Rub’ al Khali alatt!
description.schinese: 抵达鲁卜哈利沙漠下的废墟

description.english: Reach the final level.
description.french: Atteindre le dernier niveau.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello finale.
description.spanish: Llega al nivel final.
description.portuguese: Chegue ao nível final.
description.hungarian: Érd el a végső szintet!
description.schinese: 到达最后的遗迹

description.english: Die in five different ways.
description.french: Mourir de cinq façons différentes.
description.italian: Muori in cinque modi diversi.
description.spanish: Muere de cinco formas diferentes.
description.portuguese: Morra de cinco formas diferentes.
description.hungarian: Halj meg öt különböző módon!
description.schinese: 以五种不同方式死去

description.english: Don't get caught by the mummies in the Connection halls.
description.german: Lass dich in den Verbindungskammern nicht von den Mumien erwischen.
description.french: Ne pas vous faire prendre par les momies dans les salles interstitielles.
description.italian: Non farti prendere dalle mummie nelle sale di collegamento.
description.spanish: No te dejes atrapar por las momias en las salas de conexión.
description.russian: пе дайте поймать ѿебѿ мумиѿм в переходах.
description.portuguese: Não seja pego pelas múmias nos salões de conexão.
description.hungarian: Ne hagyd, hogy a múmiák elkapjanak az összekötő folyosókon!
description.schinese: 不被连接大厅中的木乃伊抓住

description.english: Solve the puzzle on the cellar door without any clues.
description.german: Löse das Rätsel an der Kellertür ohne Hinweise.
description.french: Résoudre l'énigme sur la porte de la cave sans indice.
description.italian: Risolvi l'enigma sulla porta della cantina senza indizi.
description.spanish: Resuelve el enigma de la puerta del sótano sin pistas.
description.russian: Решите головоломку на подвальной двери без подѿказок.
description.portuguese: Solucione o quebra-cabeças na porta da adega, sem nenhuma pista.
description.turkish: Mahzen kapısındaki bulmacayı, hiç ipucu kullanmadan çöz.
description.hungarian: Oldd meg a rejtvényt a pinceajtón segítség nélkül!
description.schinese: 不借助任何提示解决地窖门上的谜题

description.english: Finish the game with 100% progress.
description.french: Terminer le jeu à 100 %.
description.italian: Concludi il gioco con il 100% dei progressi
description.spanish: Termina la partida con un progreso del 100 %.
description.portuguese: Termine o jogo com 100% de progresso.
description.hungarian: Teljesítsd a játékot 100% befejezettséggel!
description.schinese: 以100%完成度通关
